title: Dusk
description: After you have sacrificed your freedom what else is there to lose?  Mary Anne has given her word to Hunter that sheâ€™ll stay as his mate, but every second she spends with him takes her further away from Gage when he needs her the most.  Caught between love and duty, Mary Anne discovers that her troubles are just beginning, and that sometimes love comes at a great price.  *New Adult Paranormal Romance*
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
